news.title: ThreeFold @ Odyssey Momentum 2020!

news.content:
This weekend, ThreeFold will be involved in Odyssey Momentum 2020 ‚Äì Momentum is an online event of 49 hours with more than 2,000 participants and 105 teams working on 21 complex 21st-century problems.

ThreeFold is one of the platforms which can be used by participants, and we also have a ThreeFold team member there as a "jedi," who will be supporting participants in developing their solutions.

May the force be with all participants this weekend! üôè
news.excerpt: Momentum is an online event of 49 hours with more than 2,000 participants and 105 teams working on 21 complex 21st-century problems.

previous.title: Why ThreeFold chose Stellar
previous.excerpt: At ThreeFold, together with a beautiful ecosystem of partners, we are co-creating a peer-to-peer Internet that empowers equality, freedom, and sustainability.
